name: UpdateProjectAction
description:
Update and track views for a project action in Datadog.

Use this tool to update details of a specific action within a project in Datadog and log a new view of the resource.

parameters.name: action_id
parameters.description: The unique integer to identify the action within the project for updating.

value_schema.description: A unique integer value identifying this action.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: ID of the project to access. Obtain this by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: output_format
parameters.description: Specifies the format of the data response. Options are 'csv' or 'json'.

parameters.name: action_update_details
parameters.description: A JSON object with details needed to update the project action, including id, name, description, tags, and more.

user_access_level.description: The effective access level the user has for this object

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this action.

value_schema.description: A unique integer value identifying this action.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

user_access_level.description: The effective access level the user has for this object
